name: Indian Institute of Management Ahmedabad
description: Founded on December 11, 1961, IIMA quickly assumed leadership in management education in India and has maintained it ever since. It has grown into India's favorite management school. The benchmark in management education in the country, it attracts the best of students and faculty. Recruiters ranging from global investment banks to NGOs working with the poor harvest its graduates. Delighted, they keep coming back for more. It is not surprising that one-third of the CEOs in India had their introduction to professional management at IIMA.
business_objectives: Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline: IIM Ahmedabad is globally recognized for its excellence in management education.
ShortDescription: IIMA is leading insitute in management education in India.

Highlights.name: Research Focus on Real-World Issues
Highlights.description: IIMA conducts research that impacts practice, policy, and academia [1]. Some of the recent research areas include liability of foreignness in crowdsourcing creative work, infrastructure and finance in India, and the long-hour culture in finance [1]. This focus on real-world issues ensures that IIMA's research is relevant and impactful.

Highlights.name: Thriving Residential Campus Community
Highlights.description: IIMA has a thriving residential campus community with students, faculty, and staff from all over the world [1]. The campus is like a mini-city with its own sports facilities, library, and sustainable initiatives [1]. This creates a rich and vibrant learning environment for students.

Highlights.name: Top Ranked Business School in India
Highlights.description: The Indian Institute of Management Ahmedabad (IIMA) is a leading global management institution [1]. It is ranked 1st among Business Schools in India by the NIRF (Management Category) since 2020 [1]. IIMA offers a variety of academic programs including Ph.D., MBA, Executive Education, and more [1].

enhanced_description: Founded on December 11, 1961, the Indian Institute of Management Ahmedabad (IIMA) rapidly established itself as a leader and benchmark in management education within India, maintaining its top position ever since. It is globally recognized for its excellence and is ranked 1st among Business Schools in India by the NIRF (Management Category) since 2020. IIMA attracts top students and faculty, and its graduates are highly sought after by recruiters ranging from global investment banks to NGOs, with one-third of India's CEOs having started their professional management journey at IIMA. The institute offers a variety of academic programs, including Ph.D., MBA, and Executive Education, and is committed to building a more diverse and inclusive workforce. IIMA features a thriving residential campus community with comprehensive facilities for health & wellness, hospitality & utilities, and accessibility for the differently abled. Its research initiatives focus on real-world issues, impacting practice, policy, and academia.
